spellcheck

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • spellcheck.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A group of useful utilities for creating a spell checker.
    Author:
    Stephen G. Ware

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char[] LETTERS
      An array of all valid letters in order

      Utilities() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static char[] getLetters(java.lang.String string)
      Given some string, this function first sanitize(java.lang.String)s it and then converts it to an array of characters.
      static int indexOf(char c)
      Given one of the letters in LETTERS, this function returns the index of that letter in the LETTERS array.
      static java.lang.String sanitize(java.lang.String string)
      Given some string, this functions converts it to upper case and removes all non-letter characters.

        Returns:

      • getLetters

        public static final char[] getLetters(java.lang.String string)
        Given some string, this function first sanitize(java.lang.String)s it and then converts it to an array of characters.
        Parameters:
        string - the string to convert
        Returns:
        the sanitized string, as an array of characters
